page.title: 17LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: In this area there are many farms with the same name .e.g.{North Ythsie}and {South Ythsie.}This is because at one time these farms were all one large farm.It was split up because it was uneconomical. It was easier to sell parts of the farm than to sell it whole, but now this trend has changed because larger farms prove more economical. There is a hollow called {Gallows Ring}in which the local people would go to see hangings. It was like a theatre where everybody stood around to watch. Many centuries ago this area must have been a turbulant place where there were{forts.}An{iron sword}has been found and it is still possible to find{flint arrowheads.}There are also what seem to be religious sites, for example :{stone circles,cist and {cairns.
